front.title: A YANG Data Model for SD-WAN VPN Service Delivery

abstract.t: This document defines a SD-WAN VPN service model to enable a Service Provider to deliver SD-WAN VPN services to its customers by provisioning the CE devices on behalf of the customer. This document is based on provider-provisioned CE-based VPNs as described in [RFC4110]. This model provides an abstracted view of the SD-WAN VPN service configuration components, and is intended to be instantiated at the management system to deliver the overall service.
